changeLang: ใช้ในภาษาไทย

hero.graphicAlt: Arrows pointing into MySK from the left
hero.title: Welcome to MySK

subtitle.student: You’re almost there. Let’s set a few things up first.
subtitle.teacher: You’re almost there. Let’s set a few things up first.

hero.notice: Please ensure all data entered in each section within this page is correct before proceeding to the next one. Parts of the data entered here can take a long time to be later changed, if modification is even possible.

dataCheck.title: Data check
dataCheck.desc: We have imported your data from relevant school departments. This process may introduce some error, so check if it misses anything.

vaccine.title: Vaccination data
vaccine.desc: According to school policy, we are required to collect your vaccination data for the school's vaccination statistics.

newPassword.title: Create password
newPassword.desc: For the security of you and the school’s data, create a new password.

prepareForStudents.title: Prepare for students
prepareForStudents.desc: For teachers, there are a few more things you have to do to make MySK ready for your students. Learn more in this section.

done.title: You’re all set
done.desc: Everything is ready for you to start using MySK.

dataCheck.title: Data check
dataCheck.desc: We have imported your data from relevant school departments. This process may introduce some error, including incorrect or missing data. For example, your first name and middle name maybe combined into the first name field, or you’re still listed as “Master” after you have turned 15. You can correct these import errors in this section.

newPassword.title: Create password
newPassword.desc: For the security of you and the school’s data, create a new password for MySK. Enter your new password twice to confirm.

vaccineData.title: Vaccination data
vaccineData.instruction: Enter your vaccination info exactly as seen in the Mor Prom app. You can see it by opening the Mor Prom app > Log in > Tap “Health Certificate” > Tap “Vaccineation of COVID-19”
vaccineData.notice: Your vaccine data will only be used for the school statistics only. Thank you for your cooperation.

done.title: You’re all set
done.desc: Everything is ready for you to start using MySK. If you have any questions or concerns, visit the <2>help page</2>.
